#Finding derivaties using R

```{r}
# Create an expression

ex1 <- expression(x^2)

# Take the derivative

der_ex1_x <- D(expr = ex1, name = "x")
der_ex1_x

 
der_ex1_x_fun <- function(x) {
  2 * x
}


```
